amendment.description: To require additional recommendations in the report on the delivery of health care benefits through the military health care system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1358 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1358 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To require additional recommendations in the report on the delivery of health care benefits through the military health care system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1358 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1358 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
